001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.util.*;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010
011import javax.annotation.Nullable;
012
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
014import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
016
017import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
018
019/**
020    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
021    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
022    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
023
024    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
025 */
026public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
027    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
028    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
029
030    private URI apiBaseUrl;
031    private boolean useAuthCircuitBreaker;
032    private int authRetries;
033    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
034    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
035    private Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
036    private Supplier<Middleware> correlationIdMiddleware;
037    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
038    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
039    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
040    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
041    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
042    private VrapHttpClient oauthHttpClient;
043    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
044    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
045
046    /**
047     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
048     * @return ClientBuilder instance
049     */
050    public static ClientBuilder of() {
051        return new ClientBuilder();
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
056     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
057     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
058     * @return ClientBuilder instance
059     */
060    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
061        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link ApiHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
066     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
067     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
068     * @return ClientBuilder instance
069     */
070    public static ClientBuilder of(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
071        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
076     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
077     * @return ClientBuilder instance
078     */
079    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
080        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
081    }
082
083    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
084        this.stack = () -> stack;
085        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
086        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
087        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
088        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
089        this.authRetries = 1;
090    }
091
092    private ClientBuilder() {
093        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of().get();
094        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
095        this.stack = stackSupplier();
096        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
097        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
098        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
099        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
100        this.authRetries = 1;
101    }
102
103    private ClientBuilder(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
104        this.httpClient = httpClient;
105        this.oauthHttpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of().get();
106        this.stack = stackSupplier();
107        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
108        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
109        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
110        this.authRetries = 1;
111    }
112
113    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
114        this.httpClient = httpClient;
115        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
116        this.stack = stackSupplier();
117        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
118        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
119        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
120        this.authRetries = 1;
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
125     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
126     */
127    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
128        return () -> {
129            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
130            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
131            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
132            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
133            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
134            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
135            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
136            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
137            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
138        };
139    }
140
141    /**
142     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
143     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
144     */
145    private Supplier<HandlerStack> oauthHandlerSupplier() {
146        return () -> {
147            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
148            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
149            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
150            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(oauthHttpClient)), middlewareStack);
151        };
152    }
153
154    public ClientBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
155        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
156        return this;
157    }
158
159    public ClientBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
160        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = true;
161        return this;
162    }
163
164    public ClientBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
165        this.authRetries = authRetries;
166        return this;
167    }
168
169    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
170        this.stack = () -> stack;
171        return this;
172    }
173
174    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
175        this.httpClient = httpClient;
176        return this;
177    }
178
179    public ClientBuilder withOAuthHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
180        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
181        return this;
182    }
183
184    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
185        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
186        return this;
187    }
188
189    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
190        this.serializer = serializer;
191        return this;
192    }
193
194    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
195        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
196        return this;
197    }
198
199    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
200        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
201        return this;
202    }
203
204    /**
205     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
206     * @param factory
207     * @return
208     */
209    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
210        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
211        return this;
212    }
213
214    /**
215     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
216     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
217     * <ul>
218     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
219     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
220     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
221     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
222     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
223     * </ul>
224     * </p>
225     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
226     * @return ClientBuilder instance
227     */
228    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
229        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
230                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
231                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
232                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
233                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
234    }
235
236    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
237        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
238    }
239
240    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
241            final String tokenEndpoint) {
242        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
243    }
244
245    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
246            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
247        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
248            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
249    }
250
251    /**
252     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String)} instead
253     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
254     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
255     * @return client builder
256     */
257    @Deprecated
258    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
259        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
260    }
261
262    /**
263     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String, VrapHttpClient)} instead
264     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
265     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
266     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
267     * @return client builder
268     */
269    @Deprecated
270    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
271            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
272        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
273    }
274
275    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
276        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
277    }
278
279    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
280            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
281        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClientSupplier);
282    }
283
284    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
285            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
286        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
287    }
288
289    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
290            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
291        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
292            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
293    }
294
295    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
296        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
297    }
298
299    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
300            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
301        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
302            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
303    }
304
305    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
306            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
307        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
308            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
309    }
310
311    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
312        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
313    }
314
315    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
316        return withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
317    }
318
319    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
320            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
321        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
322            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
323    }
324
325    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
326            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
327        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
328            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
329    }
330
331    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
332            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
333        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
334            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
335    }
336
337    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
338            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage) {
339        return withAnonymousRefreshFlow(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint, refreshTokenEndpoint, storage,
340            oauthHandlerSupplier());
341    }
342
343    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
344            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
345        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
346            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClientSupplier.get()));
347    }
348
349    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
350            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
351        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
352            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClient));
353    }
354
355    private TokenSupplier createInMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
356        return new InMemoryTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier);
357    }
358
359    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
360            final String anonTokenEndpoint, final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage,
361            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
362        final RefreshFlowTokenSupplier refreshFlowTokenSupplier = createRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials,
363            refreshTokenEndpoint, tokenStorage, httpClient);
364
365        final AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier anonymousFlowTokenSupplier = new AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier(
366            credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), credentials.getScopes(), anonTokenEndpoint,
367            refreshFlowTokenSupplier, httpClient);
368
369        return new TokenStorageSupplier(tokenStorage, anonymousFlowTokenSupplier);
370    }
371
372    private RefreshFlowTokenSupplier createRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
373            final String tokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
374        return new RefreshFlowTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), tokenEndpoint,
375            tokenStorage, httpClient);
376    }
377
378    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
379            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
380        return withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
381    }
382
383    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
384            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
385        return withTokenSupplier(
386            () -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password,
387                tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
388    }
389
390    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
391            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
392        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
393            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
394    }
395
396    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
397            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
398        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
399            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
400    }
401
402    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
403        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
404    }
405
406    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware) {
407        this.errorMiddleware = errorMiddleware;
408        return this;
409    }
410
411    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
412        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get()));
413    }
414
415    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
416        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> errorMiddleware);
417    }
418
419    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
420        this.retryMiddleware = retryMiddleware;
421        return this;
422    }
423
424    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(RetryMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
425        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
426    }
427
428    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
429        return withRetryMiddleware(new RetryMiddleware(maxRetries));
430    }
431
432    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
433        return withRetryMiddleware(new RetryMiddleware(maxRetries, statusCodes));
434    }
435
436    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
437        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
438        return this;
439    }
440
441    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
442        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
443    }
444
445    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
446        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> {
447            final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier.get());
448            return OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler, authRetries, useAuthCircuitBreaker);
449        });
450    }
451
452    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
453        return withTokenSupplier(() -> tokenSupplier);
454    }
455
456    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
457        this.internalLoggerMiddleware = internalLoggerMiddleware;
458        return this;
459    }
460
461    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
462        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory));
463    }
464
465    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
466        return withApiBaseUrl(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
467    }
468
469    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
470        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
471        return this;
472    }
473
474    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
475        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
476    }
477
478    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
479        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
480        return this;
481    }
482
483    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
484        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
485            correlationIdMiddleware = () -> (request, next) -> {
486                if (request.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID) != null) {
487                    return next.apply(request);
488                }
489                return next.apply(
490                    request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId()));
491            };
492        }
493        return this;
494    }
495
496    /**
497     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
498     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
499     * @return ClientBuilder instance
500     */
501    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
502        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
503        return this;
504    }
505
506    /**
507     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
508     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
509     * @return ClientBuilder instance
510     */
511    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
512        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
513        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
514            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
515        }
516        return this;
517    }
518
519    /**
520     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
521     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
522     * @return ClientBuilder instance
523     */
524    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
525        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
526        return this;
527    }
528
529    /**
530     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
531     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
532     * @return ClientBuilder instance
533     */
534    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
535        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
536        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
537            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
538        }
539        return this;
540    }
541
542    public ApiHttpClient build() {
543        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
544            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
545    }
546
547    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
548        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
549        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
550        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
551        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
552        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
553    }
554}
